description: Cirago CST-12500 2500GB High-Speed Portable Storage USB 2.0 External Hard Drive is very reliable, easy to use external hard drive. It’s a perfect solution to store & to share important data, music, photos and videos. It is an easy installation - plug-n-play into computer's USB 2.0 port and your ready to go! The Cirago's durable aluminum, slim & compact ligh-weight case design allows you to put in your pocket for 'on the go' or takes up very little space on your desk.
title: Cirago CST1250 250 GB USB 2.0 Portable Storage
